detail_desc: Trousers in soft cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet with elasticated heels.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with a shawl collar, draped front and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Thin metal chain necklaces. One with a round hammered pendant and the other with a pearly plastic pendant. Adjustable lengths 36-44 cm and 45-53 cm.
Blouse in airy organza with a collar, covered buttons down the front, 3/4-length puff sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button. Unlined.
Jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly, side pockets, back pockets and traces of a coin pocket that has been removed. Slim, straight legs.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Sleeveless top in a crinkled viscose weave in a narrow cut with gathers at the top and short, narrow shoulder straps. Lace trim around the armholes.

Calf-length skirt in a sturdy, slightly stretchy viscose weave with a concealed grosgrain band inside the waistband and a concealed zip at the back with a hook-and-eye fastener. High slits front and back. Unlined.
Soft nursing bra in microfibre with opening, lightly padded cups with space for nursing pads, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with a V-neck, buttons down the front and patch front pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Hooded jacket with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Boxy coat in soft, felted fabric containing some wool with notch lapels and buttons at the front. Flap welt front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. The polyester content of the coat is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.

Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with notch lapels, a V-shaped opening at the top, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, elbow-length sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, covered elastication at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Set with a pair of ballet pumps in imitation leather and a hairband in cotton jersey. Shoes with a satin bow on the front and elastic strap over the foot. Linings and insoles in a cotton weave. Hairband with a satin bow at the front.
Short dress in sweatshirt fabric with a lace collar, opening with a button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Underwired lace bras with moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Tops in organic cotton jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves.
Ballet shoes with a shimmering metallic finish. Wide elastic gore at the top and narrow elastication around the opening. Linings and insoles in a cotton weave. Suede soles.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in soft cotton jersey with lace details. Top with a gentle V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hat knitted in a soft cotton blend with ear flaps and ties under the chin. Cotton jersey lining.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a cotton blend.
Straight, wide jumper in a soft, fine knit with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, wide sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Leggings with wide elastication at the waist.
Suede mules with a large bow at the front and braided jute trim around the soles. Satin linings and leather insoles. Small platform 3 cm.
Hat knitted in soft cashmere with a roll edge.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides, a loop at the back and a decorative welt seam around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 3 cm.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved tops in ribbed, organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a scalloped trim around the neckline.

Jacket in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood with a decorative drawstring. Zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets, a text motif on the chest and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in a crêpe weave with elastication at the back of the waist and pleats at the front. Zip fly and button, a low crotch and wide, gently tapered legs.
Double-breasted coat in sturdy fabric with a collar, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and concealed side pockets. Lined.
Triangular scarf in a lightweight, patterned weave with decorative fringing.

Wide shirt that tapers at the waist to create a dramatic silhouette. Wide turn-down collar, a concealed button band, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with cuff plackets and wide, buttoned cuffs. Folded, visible seams down the sleeves and front, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined, wrapover hood and ribbing at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and small opening with ties at the front of the hem.

Shirt in premium cotton with a cutaway collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Varying pattern on the inside of the cuffs and collar stand. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Fully lined swimsuit with shaped, padded cups, a wrapover top, seam under the bust and low-cut back. Gathers in the side seams for best fit. The swimsuit is made partly from recycled polyester and polyamide.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fitted T-shirt in stretch, ribbed organic cotton jersey.

V-neck sports bralette in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide shoulder straps, lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust, and a racer back. Medium support. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Shirt in an airy weave with a collar and sewn-in ties at the top. Buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Suit trousers in a textured weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, extended waistband with a concealed button, and zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button.
Trousers in a lightweight weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight legs. Jersey ribbing at the waist for optimum fit.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Wide, short top in soft organic cotton and modal jersey with short dolman sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.
Bra in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Set with a matching iPhone case and protective AirPod case in plastic. The AirPod case has a cap and an eyelet in one side.
Very thin tights with a control top to hold in the tummy and seat. The tights provide light support to help maintain good circulation in the legs. 7 denier.
Joggers in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a washed look. Elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Mesh gym bag with a drawstring at the top. Can be carried like a backpack. Polyester lining. Size 40x45 cm.
Joggers in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and ribbed hems.
Boots in imitation leather with a decorative welt seam around the soles, padding around the top of the shaft and lacing at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3 cm.
Sports joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, taped details and side pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees for extra mobility and wide ribbed hems.
Wide trousers in a softly draping weave with an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless dress with a sequined bodice, concealed zip at the back and seam with a detachable satin tie belt at the waist. Flared skirt with several layers of tulle for added width. Lined.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Vest top in soft linen jersey with a deep V-neck front and back.
Metal earrings in various designs, one pair with fabric tassels, and one pair with feathers. Length between 0.3 and 10 cm.
Blouse in woven fabric with a pointed collar, scalloped button band, long sleeves with wide buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short skirt in a textured weave with a concealed zip at the back and a raw-edge hem. Lined.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a brushed finish. Detachable, fleece-lined hood with a faux fur trim, a stand-up collar with a chin guard, and a zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening down the front. Fake pockets at the top, flap patch pockets with a press-stud, and a small single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood and zip down the front. Side pockets, an inner pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined. Polyester filling.
Trousers in a soft cotton blend with covered elastication at the waist, and side pockets.
Gloves knitted in a soft cashmere blend with a long, ribbed shaft.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elastication around the top.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a V-neck and drawstring at the front.
Blouse in a soft weave with a wide, elasticated neckline, short, tie-hem raglan sleeves and an elasticated hem.
Jumper in textured-knit wool containing some cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hipster briefs in organic cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter from 1.5 cm to 2 cm.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with a wide, elasticated waistband. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (normal sequins in size 2-3Y). Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Pyjamas in a printed cotton blend. Short-sleeved top with a round neck. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and wide, tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Short-sleeved, fitted jersey top with a slightly deeper neckline.
